title: About Mtech in Data Science and Machine Learning
content: Guys who have finished the 2 year MTech program in DSML. I want to know your thoughts on campus life, syllabus, exams and placements. What would be the lowest possible effort  for a good outcome and what should be the highest possible effort for an awesome outcome. I want to join. I did mechanical engineering worked in it for a year, then became a web developer the job I really liked until the company ruined it for me

comments.body: I think only btech students are active in this sub..
But pesu has mtech program as well right ?
Yes but, koi mtech wale ko nhi deka ab tak is sub pe..
